product_name: Girnar Green Tea, Desi Kahwa, 36 Tea Bags (36 Teabags (Pack of 2)): Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_title: You will like it or hate it. No middle way
reviews.review_body: This one came as a fresh stock. Well packed. This is my second time purchase.The taste is certainly unique. People may like it or hate it, but I loved its taste. It has many spices along with the green tea and may be I can say that it tastes something like a pepper Rasam to an extent.

This is a unique product which I came across when a bought a multi pack of Girnar green tea with 8 flavours in one pack. This was the only decent flavour - and it is one of a kind product. Not only have I been buying it separately now, my office colleagues are too impressed and they have also started buying it.
This is the best Herbal tea to sip...Easy way man....it is simply the Best Green Masala tea..I love it.
I wish if I could give 0 stars. Totally disappointed by the product which I got. Was wet in some kind of smelly liquid. I want a replacement. Even the tea bags were missing.

reviews.review_title: The thread gets detached from the tea bag
reviews.review_body: The packing sucks, its thread always get detached and i need to pour all the stuff in my glass and need to wait till the whole tea gets sedimented in the glass. I lost approx 15 tea bags out of 36 tea bags.

reviews.review_title: AVERAGE, but not use in regular base
reviews.review_body: its to much spicy, best in winter and cold but even though can not use in daily basis because it contains black pepar and other ingredients which are not good for daily use.
Must try, you will forget normal green tea.
